name: Gorgod
text: You look strong, can you fight?

name: You
text: Uh... Yeah I guess I can

name: Gorgod
text: Fantastic! We need your help in that case.

name: Gorgod
text: There's this massive slime that up north that is terrorizing the town.

name: Gorgod
text: If you could deal with it, I think we have a juicy reward for you

name: You
text: Why not, I could take a slime

name: Gorgod
text: Thats the spirit, follow the path north and you should find it.
